Class JSCalendar

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  js.JSPanel
                      js.JSCalendar
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class JSCalendar
extends JSPanel
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.awt.event.MouseListener

JSCalendar provides a simple way to display a calendar on screen and allows 'events' to be added and displayed.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Nested Class Summary
 class JSCalendar.Event
          Represents an event displayed on a JSCalendar.

Constructor Detail

JSCalendar

public JSCalendar()
Creates a new JSCalendar with today's date as the initial view.

JSCalendar

public JSCalendar(int initialMonth,
                  int initialYear)
Creates a new JSCalendar with the initial view set to the specified month of the specified year.

Parameters:
initialMonth - the integer index of the month to set as the initial view (one of Calendar.JANUARY, Calendar.FEBRUARY, etc.)
initialYear - the integer year to set as the initial view.

JSCalendar

public JSCalendar(java.util.Calendar initialDate)
Creates a new JSCalendar with the initial view set to the specified date.

Parameters:
initialDate - a Calendar object representing the date to show as the initial view.
Method Detail

getBlankDayColor

public java.awt.Color getBlankDayColor()
Returns the color being used as the blank days on the calendar, i.e. the grid squares before the 1st and after the last day of the month.

Returns:
a Color object representing the color of the blank days.

getSelectedDay

public int getSelectedDay()
Returns the day number of the grid square most recently clicked by the user, i.e. the value that would represent Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH.

Returns:
an integer representing the day of the month that was clicked.

getEventsForDate

public JSCalendar.Event[] getEventsForDate(java.util.Calendar date)
Returns an array of all the events that have been added to the specified date.

Parameters:
date - the date to retrieve the events for.
Returns:
an array of Event objects representing all the events from the specified date.

setDayColor

public void setDayColor(int day,
                        java.awt.Color c)
Sets the background color of the specified day's grid square

Parameters:
day - the integer representing the value of Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH for the day to change the color of.
c - the color to set the day's background to.

setDayLabelColor

public void setDayLabelColor(int day,
                             java.awt.Color c)
Sets the color of the day number label of the specified day's grid square

Parameters:
day - the integer representing the value of Calendar.DAY_OF_MONTH for the day to change the color of.
c - the color to set the day's label to.

setBlankDayColor

public void setBlankDayColor(java.awt.Color c)
Sets the color of blank grid squares, i.e. those before the 1st and after the last day of the month.

Parameters:
c - the color to set the background of blank grid squares to.

addEvent

public void addEvent(java.util.Calendar date,
                     java.lang.String title,
                     java.awt.Color color)
Adds an event to the specified date to be displayed on the calendar.

Parameters:
date - the Calendar object representing the date to add the event to
title - the title of the event to be displayed on the calendar
color - the background color of the event when displayed

update

public void update()
Updates the calendar to display any changes made since the last refresh occurred.

goToDate

public void goToDate(java.util.Calendar date)
Changes the calendar view to display the specified date.

Parameters:
date - the Calendar object representing the date to show

goToDate

public void goToDate(int month,
                     int year)
Changes the calendar view to display the specified date.

Parameters:
month - the integer index of the month to display (one of Calendar.JANUARY, Calendar.FEBRUARY, etc.)
year - the year to display

goToMonth

public void goToMonth(int month)
Changes the calendar view to display the specified month of the year currently being displayed.

Parameters:
month - the integer index of the month to display (one of Calendar.JANUARY, Calendar.FEBRUARY, etc.)
